description: This extension creates a controls that lets the user pan and zoom about a graph. This complements the built-in gesture support for panning and zooming by giving less savvy users a more traditional UI -- similar to controls on map.

panDragAreaSize.description: The length of the pan drag box in which the vector for panning is calculated (bigger = finer control of pan speed and direction)

panInactiveArea.description: Radius of inactive area in pan drap box

panIndicatorMinOpacity.description: Min opacity of pan indicator (the draggable nib); scales from this to 1.0

panMinPercentSpeed.description: The slowest speed we can pan by (as a percent of panSpeed)

panSpeed.description: How many milliseconds in between pan ticks

zoomDelay.description: How many milliseconds between zoom ticks

zoomOnly.description: A minimal version of the ui only with zooming (useful on systems with bad mousewheel resolution)
